Over the past decade there has been many concerns for the unemployment rates throughout this country.

## **Are higher undergrad tuition costs raising the unemployment rates?**

I will be analyzing data listed from the costs of undergrad tuition throughout every state within the United States. I will be using this data to support my hypothesis on there being a trend of higher costs of tuition equating to higher unemployment rates.
